1. [Link Preview](https://criscoerp.com/version-12/release-notes/features#link-preview)
1. [New Upload Dialog](https://criscoerp.com/version-12/release-notes/features#new-upload-dialog)
1. [Frequently visited links appear in Awesomebar results](https://criscoerp.com/version-12/release-notes/features#frequently-visited-links-appear-in-awesomebar-results)
1. [Full Width Container]((https://criscoerp.com/version-12/release-notes/features#full-width-container))
1. [List View Enhancements](https://criscoerp.com/version-12/release-notes/features#list-view-enhancements)
